ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Redshifted version of redden. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: IR/optical/UV extinction from Cardelli et al. (1989, ApJ, 345, 245). The transmission is set to unity shortward of 900 Angstroms. This is incorrect physically but does allow the model to be used in combination with an X-ray photoelectric absorption model such as xsphabs.
This is a multiplicative model component.
This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
